import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' function Encode() { const [inputMessage, setMessage] = useState(""); const [rotorOne, setRotorOne] = useState('I'); const [rotorTwo, setRotorTwo] = useState('I'); const [rotorThree, setRotorThree] = useState('I'); const [ringOne, setRingOne] = useState('A') const [ringTwo, setRingTwo] = useState('A') const [ringThree, setRingThree] = useState('A') const [reflector, setReflector] = useState('UKW-C'); useEffect(() => { isValidInput(inputMessage); console.log("Use effect inputmessge: ", inputMessage); console.log("test 1UseEffect rotor1: ", rotorOne) console.log("test 2UseEffect rotor2: ", rotorTwo) console.log("test 3UseEffect rotor3: ", rotorThree) console.log("ringSetting one: ", ringOne) console.log("ringSetting Two: ", ringTwo) console.log("ringSetting Three: ", ringThree) console.log("settings side: ", reflector) }, [inputMessage, rotorOne, rotorTwo, rotorThree, ringOne, ringTwo, ringThree, reflector]) //eslint-disable-line react-hooks/exhaustive-deps function isValidInput(inputMessage) { if (/^[a-zA-Z]*$/g.test(inputMessage)){ console.log("its a valid input"); } else{ console.log("error bad input") alert("Please use only the letters A-Z either upper or lower case.") } } return (
setMessage(event.target.value)} />

Rotors settings

) } export default Encode
